rules_text: When Laden Steed enters, arm target creature you control. [i](Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {2} attached to it.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]On treks across the frontier, many bring at least a horse's worth of supplies. In such a mercurial world it's best to over-prepare.[/i]
